Today in Gower, surf is small and not producing, with 2 ft @6s ESE and fresh 14 mph E winds. Tomorrow, it drops further to 1 ft @10s WSW, still with fresh 19 mph E winds, making it a quiet day. By the day after, conditions remain similar with 2 ft @8s SSE and 22 mph ENE winds, keeping it blown out. Best: today.
